products.title: Three Core Tools
products.subtitle: Professional sight reading practice solutions for different training needs

melody.title: Melody Sight Reading Generator
melody.description: Freely choose note values, precisely control articulations (staccato, legato, accents, etc.), and even set their frequency. Completely tailor practice content to your needs.

interval.title: Interval Sight Reading Generator
interval.description: Targeted training for specific intervals, freely choose which interval types to practice. From major seconds to perfect octaves, master every interval precisely.

chord.title: Chord Sight Reading Generator
chord.description: Supports various chord types: major triads, minor triads, diminished triads, sus, etc. Provides guitar-specific voicings: Drop2, Drop3, Shell Voicing, Close Voicing.

features.title: Powerful
features.subtitle: Professional-grade features to help you reach new musical heights

customize.title: Fully Customizable Generation
customize.description: Freely choose key signatures, time signatures, note values, and custom frequencies to create practice content that perfectly fits your needs.

guitarVoicing.title: Guitar-Specific Voicings
guitarVoicing.description: Provides guitar-specific voicing configurations including Drop2, Drop3, Shell Voicing, Close Voicing, and more.

articulations.title: Articulation Control
articulations.description: Precisely control playing techniques like staccato, legato, accents, and even set their frequency of occurrence.

multiInstrument.title: Multi-Instrument Support
multiInstrument.description: Suitable for guitar, piano, violin, bass, and various other instruments, meeting the needs of different performers.

randomOrTonal.title: Random/Tonal Generation
randomOrTonal.description: Choose between completely random note generation or melodies following specified tonalities to flexibly meet practice needs.

affordable.title: Unlimited Practice, More Affordable Than Any Sight Reading Book
affordable.description: One purchase, infinite practice content generation, far better value than traditional sight reading materials.
